title: OpenMetrics Parser Enhancement
description:
Add lightweight OpenMetrics parsing to enhance existing discovery:

1. Authoritative type detection from scrape headers (vs pattern inference)
2. Cardinality analysis with configurable threshold warnings
3. Optional integration with existing MetricDiscoveryClient
4. New flag: --analyze-metrics for detailed report

Effort: ~4 hours
Priority: P2 (after Error Budget Foundation)
